original_text: The donkey saw me and turned away from me these three times. If it had not turned away, I would certainly have killed you by now, but I would have spared it.”
korean_text: 나귀가 나를 보고 이같이 세 번을 돌이켜 내 앞에서 피하였느니라 나귀가 만일 돌이켜 나를 피하지 아니하였더면 내가 벌써 너를 죽이고 나귀는 살렸으리라

sentences.original_text: If it had not turned away,
I would certainly have killed you by now,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 분명 지금쯤 너를 죽였을 것이다,

sentences.original_text: but I would have spared it.
